summary: A filmic reflection about the stereotypes of "the Jew" and " the Arab" through one hundred years of film, linked with the biographies of four extraordinary people: Iraqi-Jewish communists.
cast: Shimon Ballas|Moshe Houri|Sami Michael|Samir Naqqash|Ella Shohat
keywords: sephardic|place name in title|city name in title
title: Forget Baghdad: Jews and Arabs - The Iraqi Connection
